Name: Abomination
Info: Does fast ranged attack but is not a major threat.

Name: Acid Beast
Location: Catacombs Lvl 4,Lost City,Harem Level 1-2,Palace Cellar Level 1-3

Name: Assassin
Info: These are invisible until they hit you but you can still see their shadows on the ground.

Name: Black Knight
Info: Attacks in melee with Death Blossom skill.Death Blossom :melee attack that emits a fire splash.

Name: Blood Rogue
Info: Weak monster,you wonat have any problem.

Name: Burning Dead Mage
Info: If you wanna kill it then just sneeze at it and it will shatter.

Name: Corpse Worm
Info: His attack have poison and slows you down for a few seconds but its very weak.

Name: Couatl
Skills: Throws a small shiny ball at you
Info: Their attack is pathetic just like their face.

Name: Crystal Witch
Info: It is actually hard to tell what they do because they just die so fast.Their main feature is probably the dramatic way in which they drop dead.

Name: Cultist
Location: Black Marsh,Tamoe Highland,Monastery Gate,Outer Cloister,Barracks,Jail Levels
Info: They come in a group of 3-4 and do a multi-hitting ranged attack which is not very strong but can be a threat in early game.

Name: Dancing Light
Location: Dark Wood,Black Marsh,Tamoe Highland,Hole Level 1,Pit,Monastery Gate,Outer Cloister
Info: They are invisible when they move until they attack but like all the other invisible enemies,you can see their shadow.They do lightning packed hits when they hit in melee.Electrobolt Spell:It's a weak lightning attack at a close range.

Name: Dark Huntress
Location: Tristram,Dark Wood,Underground Passage,Hole Level 1,Black Marsh,Tamoe Highland,Pit,Tower Cellar Levels,Outer Cloister
Info: These are your fangirls so they come running to you when they see you but die as soon as they are interacted with.

Name: Dark Rogue
Info: Crazy white chicks try to act tough but are actually weak.

Name: Dark Stalker
Info: These are minions of The Countess boss.They are fast moving and do decent damage on melee hits.They cast Deathstrike when they die which is a concentrated black smoke attack that easily kills anyone.Bonus:You can go kill them on terror difficulty to finish the Witch Queenminigame.

Name: Death Gnat
Info: Fucking mosquitoesthey are everywhere,even in this game!.They are ofcourse weak and only cause annoyance.Their Open Wounds attack prevent you from healing temporarily and they steal all your stamina.Poison Flash=> Short ranged poison splash attack.

Name: Defiler
Info: Squad of their Shaman,they fight and die (easily) for his safety.Defiler Shaman will resurrect them again and again to fight you.

Name: Defiler Shaman
Info: Kill him first otherwise he will just keep resurrecting Defilers and cast Firewall under your feet.Their FIrewall attack stack so if you stand in the same spot for long,it can do some damage.Vampire Firewall:Small line of fire below enemyas feet that lasts for a few seconds.

Name: Ent
Info: Walking trees that do small melee damage but make up for it by making loud sounds on movement.

Name: Fallen One
Info: Squad of their Shaman,they fight and die (easily) for his safety.Fallen Shaman will resurrect them again and again to fight you.

Name: Fallen Shaman
Info: Kill him first otherwise he will just keep resurrecting Fallen Ones and cast Firewall under your feet.Their FIrewall attack stack so if you stand in the same spot for long,it can do some damage.Vampire Firewall:Small line of fire below enemyas feet that lasts for a few seconds.

Name: Fiend
Info: They hang from the ceiling and jumps down on you if you go near them.Their attack have lightning damage.They will start flying away when they get low on health.

Name: Flit
Info: Their looks tell you everything about how strong they must be.

Name: Gargoyle Trap
Info: Stationary statues that cast spells at you from range.Mon Bloodstar:Casts a slow moving glowing ball which carries a good amount of fire damage but is easy to dodge.

Name: Glowing Fungus
Info: They do a lightning type damage in melee range but are not very strong.Totemic Omni Lightning:Lightning attack that looks like multiple bolts of lightning traveling on floor.

Name: Harlequin
Info: These invisible guys teleport around you with every melee attack they do which makes it tricky to hit them for melee chars.

Name: Hidden One
Location: Black Marsh,Tamoe Highland,Pit,Tower Cellar Levels,Jail Levels
Info: They are invisible until they attack but you can hear them flying around.

Name: Horror Mage
Info: Slightly stronger than skeleton mages,this one does a ranged lightning attack but die easily.

Name: Hungry Dead
Info: Walking dead people moving around biting and poisoning everyone.

Name: Impaler
Info: They are weak but their Gamma attack might cause you trouble if you are surrounded by monsters.Mon Slicer blade:Casts a single rotating blade aimed at enemy.Gamma:Covers everything around himself in poison clouds which poison anyone who try to go near him.

Name: Invader
Location: Tristram,Stony Field,Dark Wood,Black Marsh,Underground Passage,Hole Level 1,Pit
Info: Squad of their Shaman,they fight and die (easily) for his safety.Invader Shaman will resurrect them again and again to fight you.

Name: Invader Shaman
Location: Tristram,Stony Field,Dark Wood,Black Marsh,Underground Passage,Hole Level 1,Pit
Info: Kill him first otherwise he will just keep resurrecting Invaders and cast Firewall under your feet.Their FIrewall attack stack so if you stand in the same spot for long,it can do some damage.Vampire Firewall:Small line of fire below enemyas feet that lasts for a few seconds.

Name: Kill Rat
Info: Its homing spikes are poisonous and it casts a nova of spikes when it dies.

Name: Lizard King
Info: It reduces your speed greatly for a short time by casting Spellbind but other than that it is not a big threat.Spellbind:Greatly reduces movement speed for a short time.

Name: Returned Archer
Info: Weak skeletons with bow and arrows,dies easily.

Name: Sasquatch
Info: No matter how fluffy you think they are,they will attack if you try to pet them.

Name: Scourge
Info: Squad of their Shaman,they fight and die (easily) for his safety.Scourge Shaman will resurrect them again and again to fight you.

Name: Scourge Shaman
Info: Kill him first otherwise he will just keep resurrecting Scourges and cast Firewall under your feet.Their FIrewall attack stack so if you stand in the same spot for long,it can do some damage.Vampire Firewall:Small line of fire below enemyas feet that lasts for a few seconds.

Name: Skeleton Archer
Info: Pile of Bones with bow and arrow,literally.

Name: Sleeping Cave Snapper
Info: These are basically money bags for early leveling chars so they don't move or attack at all but drops a lot of gold.They have a high life regeneration so if you canat deal enough damage,you won't be able to kill it.

Name: Spike Fiend
Info: Casts poisonous Homing spikes at you and dies with a spike nova on death.

Name: Stone Clan
Info: They usually come in a pack of 4 with a caster among them who attacks from distance.Blood Lord Frenzy:Gives a small boost to attack and speed.

Name: Stone Clan-Caster version
Skills: Life Lost Adds to Damage,lvl 7 Corpse Explosion,lvl 3 Mon Pain Spirit
Info: In the pack of Stone clans,this one stays behind and casts spells at you.It can be deadlyin late game if you stand on top of the enemy corpses,kill it on sight.Pain Spirit:Casts a flying spirit at you that deals magic damage.Corpse Explosion:Explodes a corpse on ground and do decent damage in a small area.

Name: Tarantula
Info: Weak spiders ruining reputations of spiders everywhere.

Name: Wandering Sarandesh
Info: It does nothing else then summon a lot of Flits who then surrounds you and attacks you.

Name: Bloodfire Rogue
Info: These rogues are nasty chicks that comes in pack and can easily trap you to death with their sexy body..er..i mean attacks.Bow version attacks:Blindside:An auto-aiming arrow at stuns.Phalanx:Summons a line of spirit archers.Spear version attacks:Takedown:Charges at you and deals a stunning blow.Celerity:temporarily increases run speed and grants freeze immunity

Name: Bonegrinder
Info: They deal high poison damage in melee hits and casts spike nova when they attack.

Name: Cog
Info: They always comes in a pack,surrounds you with high speed movement and does fast attack.Try separating them and then attack or find a way to attack them while moving and avoiding their attacks.If you kill them within spell range of Warforged Shaman,then step away from the corpse as soon as you can.

Name: Corruptor
Info: Easy to kill but if you are low on poison resistance then you need to be careful with them.They  casts a Multi-hitting cloud of poison when it hits that can kill you if u get low on HP.

Name: Corruptor Archer
Info: Their attack casts a Multi-hitting cloud of poison when it hits so having resistance would be cool.Also,since the poison cloud is multi-hitting,if you stayed within it when your HP is 1,it can kill you.

Name: Frost Raptor
Info: They do decent cold damage and can become a threat if you get surrounded by a pack of them.Mon Lemures:Multiple homing cold spirits in melee attack that comes after you

Name: Lament
Info: It's easy to kill them since they are weak but having some lightning resistance helps since they do decent damage.Mon Static Lance:Throws a bolt of lightning at you that shatters and do damage in a small area around its target.

Name: Porkchop
Info: To escape their annoying pig transformation you have to kill it,run away from its area effect,or wait till its effect disappears.They go into Frenzy Mode when they get low on health but bcz their movement speed is very slow,you can easily kill them.Porkulator=> Transforms the enemy into a pig which greatly reduces enemy's overall speed.Engage Frenzy Mode=> Boosts attack speed and damage for a short bit.

Name: Quill Bear
Info: Their Homing Spike is easy to dodge but their true damaging skill is the small barrage of magic damage dealing spikes which they cast on death.Be careful if you are a cannon glass class (0 defense) and you find these guys in a pack,instakills op.

Name: Shock Sting
Info: Fast moving bugs which do Lightning type damage but dies easily.Shock Flash-Much like Poison Flash attack,except this one does Lightning type damage.

Name: Steelfur Titan
Info: They hit in melee and stuns on striking.Concentration-The Concentration foot aura increases physical damage.

Name: Warforged Shaman
Info: Warforged Shamans are strong when they are with their minions Cog,but without them they can only cast Maelstorm which wont do much damage if you have good defence.Their main attack Death shards which they use on dead cogas bodies and do high damage so try to kill cogs away from him or kill him first.Death Shards:Explodes a nearby deadbody to cast a barrage of deadly spikes.Mon Maelstrom:A modified version of Assassinas Maelstorm which does decent damage.

Name: Prince Albrecht
Skills: Cold Enchanted,Spectral Hit,Glacial Nova on death
Info: He is the first-most Boss type you will encounter in this game.Easy to kill,he can only cause trouble for you on Hatred difficulty if he gets lucky.His arrows do cold damage and kills your movement speed and spectral hit does a big amount of damage.On death he casts a screen-wide Glacial Nova in an attempt to kill you as his dying wish.

Name: Snotspill
Info: He and his minions are very fast moving and does extra fast attack.He won't be a threat in higher difficulties but can cause you trouble in Hatred if his whole gang gets on top of you.Concentration-The Concentration foot aura increases physical damage.

Name: Grimspike
Info: He is quite weak and his aExtra Stronga damage is also very weak.He dies easily and you donat really need to bother fighting him.

Name: Blood Raven
Info: The great Blood Raven is very weak and dies super-fast.She is not even worth explaining her skills.The on death skill is the only one you need to look out for but it is easy to avoid.

Name: El Chupacabras
Info: Leader of Quill Bears,he throws spikes at you that are easy to dodge but his Spike barrage on death can be deadly.

Name: Griswold
Info: His Stone skin makes it harder to kill him if you have low damage.His most powerful attack is his Shower of Rocks that he cast when he hits you in melee.Make sure to get out of its range before it hits you otherwise a combo of Curse + SoR = major HP lost.Additionally,on Terror & Destruction he have an aura that disables use of any ranged skills.

Name: Wrathraven
Info: He guards the Scroll that you need to open the portal into Tristram.He is very weak and dies easily.

Name: The Countess
Info: She herself is not very strong when she is alive but she is guarded by her own minions and a bunch of Startled Witches that kill anyone who go near them.On death she casts Deathstrike which is a delayed attack that will 1-hit-KO.Bonus:You can go kill her on terror difficulty to finish the Witch Queenminigame.

Name: The Smith
Info: This aamini-bosaa is ultra strong for being a garbage one,be careful with it.He have very high speed and very high damage and can kill you in 1-2 hits easily.Bonus:You can kill him to obtain a Horadric Malus which you can give to Charsi in town and she will transmute 1 item of yours for free with magic properties.Nightmare:Reduces target's overall speed and prevents healing.Bloodlust:Provides damage boost to self and nearby allies.

Name: Moonbender
Info: He is weak and usually spawn in a location where you won't even run into him.

Name: Blightfire
Info: Not very strong in damage or HP,but his skills works strongly against you in a crowd of enemies.Pain Spirit:Casts a magic damage dealing homing spirit at you.Demonblood Aura:Gives a HP and life replenish boost to self and nearby allies.

Name: Andariel
Skills: Fire Throw,lvl 24 Meteor Shower,lvl 6 Hive,lvl 6 Apocalypse
Info: This beauty cast Meteor Shower,kill her before that or get ready to avoid a full Meteor Shower on your screen.She is the act 1 boss so once you kill her,you can travel to next act.Fire Throw:It is literally as its name,a bunch of traps all around target that explodes and do fire damage.Meteor Shower:Brings down a shower of meteors dealing high fire damage.Hive:Periodically creates poisonous swarms when approachedApocalypse:Causes nearby enemies to burst into hellfire.Bonus:Kill her on Terror or Destruction difficulty to obtain the Dogma of Suffering which is 1 of the Monster Tokens.

Name: Slain Soul-Magic
Info: The most annoying monster in this uber.He throws a 50k Magic damage dealing Barrel which 1-hit-KO anyone in the explosion range.

Name: Slain Soul-Poison
Info: They throw 4 poison bombs at you which spreads a cloud of poison and deal very high poison damage.

Name: Slain Soul-Lightning
Info: No special skills,they hit in melee and their attacks have lightning type damage.

Name: Slain Soul-Cold
Info: No special skills,they hit in melee and their attacks have Cold type damage.

Name: Slain Soul-Fire
Info: No special skills,they hit in melee and their attacks have Fire type damage.

Name: Necromorb
Info: Flying balls of death!They throw attack in a straight line hitting everything in its way dealing high physical damage.If you are pure physical damage type char,i suggest getting another source of damage for these balls.

Name: Fleshcutter-Mini Boss
Info: No special skills,he hit in melee and his attacks have Cold type damage.Additionally he drops his sigil which is one of the five that u need to make Assuras Bane Ring.

Name: Eyegouger-Mini Boss
Info: He throws a 50k Magic damage dealing Barrel which 1-hit-KO anyone in the explosion range.Additionally he drops his sigil which is one of the five that u need to make Assuras Bane Ring.

Name: Spinecracker-Mini Boss
Info: No special skills,he hit in melee and his attacks have Lightning type damage.Additionally he drops his sigil which is one of the five that u need to make Assuras Bane Ring.

Name: Skinrender-Mini Boss
Info: No special skills,he hit in melee and his attacks have Fire type damage.Additionally he drops his sigil which is one of the five that u need to make Assuras Bane Ring.

Name: Bonehexer-Mini Boss
Info: He throw 4 poison bombs at you which spreads a cloud of poison and heal very high poison damage.Additionally he drops his sigil which is one of the five that u need to make Assuras Bane Ring.

Name: Assur-Uber Boss
Info: He pounces on you and do major fire type damage.Stack a lot of fire resist and he is easy.You need Purify skill to kill him which can be acquired by making a Assuras Bane ring.Flamefront:Casts multiple exploding fireballs.Cataclysm:Nova of exploding fireballs.Pounce:Teleport to target and strike nearby enemies.Flamestrike:Calls down a blast of flame.

Name: Citizen
Info: Immortal zombies that you can't attack,all you can do is run as fast as you can.They hit hard and fast.Stacking up poison resistance helps a little.

Name: Punishment Turret
Info: Stationary turrets that cast a whole load of punishers doing extremely heavy poison damage.Punisher Spiral:Casts punishers in every direction in a circle..

Name: Darkwarden
Info: These big trolls have very high def and HP,if get engaged in fight with them,you will probably die.Rolling Thunder:Stuns and knockback enemy dealing heavy damage.

Name: Juris Khan,King of Ureh-Uber Boss
Info: Very notorious uber boss that can give you some major trouble with the skills he possess.Shadowstorm:Swarm of homing shadow bolts that inflict cold damage.Respawner Target:Spawns a random monster from the area on a target.Cherub Strike:retaliatory attack that manifests an angel that attacks enemies.

Name: Darkling
Info: They die easily bcz of low HP but they have good damage and their avoid help them a lot.

Name: Spider Statue
Skills: Heals Monsters on Death,lvl 6 Spawn Multi Darklings
Info: Summoned non-stop by Astrogha,these statue summons a lot of darklings and if you kill them than they have a chance to heal Astrogha to full life.

Name: Astrogha-Uber Boss
Skills: lvl 10 Frozen Orb Nova,Spider Statue,lvl 60 ND War Spirit,Teleport on hit
Info: This manwhore is a pain in the ass,he spawn totems that heals him if you destroy them,casts Frozen Orb Nova that freezes/kills you and spawns darklings that surrounds you.On top of all these,he have a chance to teleport away whenever he gets a hit so you have to keep chasing after him all over the uber.Frozen Orb Nova:Casts high cold damage dealing frozen orb that do damage in an area.Spider Statue:Summons Spider Statue who summon Darklings.ND War Spirit:Periodically emits spike novas that deal weapon damage.

Name: Nun of Vanity
Info: They have no special skills and die easily once the immunity aura is gone.

Name: Crystal Ball
Info: This spire is the shield generator of this uber and provide immunity from any damage type to every monster inside this uber.It can randomly teleport around when gets hit.Spinning Lightning Flay:A spinning lightning attack that kills anyone it touches.

Name: High Cleric Grey & High Cleric Dorian-Mini Boss-
Skills: lvl 24 Mind Flay,lvl 20 Supernova,lvl 17 Shuriken Flurry,lvl 10 Doom
Info: Weak in HP and Def,he make it up with his spells.A combo of Doom + Shuriken + Mind Flay can be costly if you are careless.Mind Flay:Chaos energy beam that explodes on the target doing lightning type damage.Supernova:Gigantic nova that does more damage at close range.Shuriken Flurry:Throw multiple homing shuriken.Doom:Adds points to physical damage taken and pierces magic resistance.

Name: Inarius-Uber Boss
Skills: lvl 25 & lvl 50 Guard Tower,Other Typhoon Sentry,lvl 40 Abyss,Mana Burn
Info: He is strong and his spells will keep you on your toes while you are fighting in this uber.He will non-stop summon Guard Towers and his Sentry won't let you get close to him.Guard Tower:Summons a tower that shoots arrows at enemies.Typhoon Sentry:Trap that casts wind blasts that knock enemies around.Abyss:Surrounds target point with a spiral of frost.

Name: Overlord
Info: They do extremely high damage and have very high overall speed.Do not take them lightly.

Name: Inarius-Uber Boss
Info: He is same as all the other Overlords except he have much higher HP and have avoid% to support him.

Name: Butcher-Uber Boss
Info: He is very fast moving and does Very high damage usually killing anyone in 1 hit.Keep your distance from him and use summons to break his immunity.Bloodlust:Increases damage and elemental damage of the party.

Name: Blood Golem
Skills: Only Vulnerable after Attacking!,Immolation Bomb on Death
Info: They have very high damage and can`t  be damaged until their attack hits someone.Use some summons to act as their punching bag.Their aon death sentrya is very strong.Immolation Bomb:Fireball sentry that explodes with a ring of fire.

Name: Bartuc-Uber Boss
Skills: Summon Hostile Blood Golem,lvl 20 Storm Crows,lvl 20 Wychwind II,lvl 20 Other Banish,Summoner Only Vulnerable after Using Wychwind Spell
Info: Very strong uber boss and is very tricky to kill.He can be damaged only after he has used his Wychwind Spell and until he casts it,he summons more Golems and they surround you quickly.Storm Crows:Throw multiple homing knives.Wychwind II:A modified version of Assassinas skill.Knife that creates a rift field on impact,but weakens the user.Other Banish:A modified version of Banish skill.Reduced life of the cursed by a percentage.

Name: Dark Nephalem
Skills: lvl 5 Enemy Divine App,lvl 10 N Superbeast
Info: Immortal and unclickable,you canat do anything but stand around while they hit you to death.Enemy Divine App:Modified version of Palaas Divine Apparition skill.Effect:teleport to target location and freeze enemies.N Superbeast:Modified version of Palaas Stormlord skill.Effect:increases overall speeds.

Name: Uldyssian,Dark Edyrem King
Skills: lvl 20 Enemy Divine App,lvl 25 N Superbeast
Info: Leader of the Dark Nephalem,he was granted the power to summon either Imperius or Malthael uber bosses if an enemy takes too many melee hits to kill.He have 1% chance to summon one of the boss whenever he lands a melee hit.Enemy Divine App:Modified version of Palaas Divine Apparition skill.Effect:teleport to target location and freeze enemies.N Superbeast:Modified version of Palaas Superbeast skill.Effect:increases overall speed.

Name: Imperius & Malthael-Uber Boss
Skills: Spell Flurry,lvl 20 Beacon Target,lvl 20 Graveyard,lvl 50 Spawn Edyrem,Rathmaas Chosen
Info: Both the boss seems identical but are different.They both give charm but for special recipe you will have to kill them both.Try to keep the fight short and fast otherwise you will find yourself swarmed with Edryms.Additionally,when they get low on HP,they cast Rathmaas Chosen skill on themselves which makes them immune to all attacks but poison.Beacon Target:Modified version of Assaas Beacon skill.Effect:periodically targets a nuclear strike at a random nearby location.Graveyard:Periodically shoots deadly spiked balls at enemiesRathmaas Chosen:Become invulnerable and deals massive magic damage.Spawn Edyrem:Self explanatory.Spell Flurry:Casts a Flurry of white magic dealing balls that deals decent damage.

Name: Infernal Machine-Uber Boss
Info: A stationary tower at the lower section of the uber which summons more elite monsters to fight for him.Additionally,it can cast Deathstrike whenever it gets struck by enemy,so keep moving around to avoid death from it.

Name: Temple Spire
Info: The Totem is easy to kill but its attack is deadly so kill it as soon as you can.Fire Coiler:Brings down a delayed single meteor on top of you.

Name: Kraken Guard
Info: They have very strong attack and a lack in cold resistance can be fatal against them.Ice Beam:A medium ranged beam of ice dealing damage to single target.

Name: Primal Clay
Info: Clay golems that have high movement and attack speed.Avoid long battles with them in melee range.Shower of Rocks:Melee attack that pounds the target with boulders.

Name: Impaler Archon
Info: They have low HP but they cast fast moving bolts of red electricity that deals decent magic and lightning damage.

Name: Vaca Loca,KIng of Meat-Mini Boss
Info: Mini boss of this uber that you need to kill and collect the Tome of Possession it drops in order to kill the final boss.It does not have any special skills but he is immune to all attacks and will randomly drop an immunity.It have extremely high melee damage so avoid it at all cost.

Name: Primus Messenger-Uber Boss
Info: Being an Immortal,he cant die but he is also the only one who can damage Arihan and kill her.Just avoid him and move ahead to Arihan,you cant do anything to him.Hellspawner:Spawns 8 bats on top of you who does decent damage.Hellfield:Casts a Teleportation Field along with Hellspawner skill so you will keep teleporting around for a short while.Arihan Killer Spell:Extremely high Burn damage that will leave you at 1 HP and is the only spell that can damage Arihan.

Name: Arihan,High Priestess of The Triune-Uber Boss
Info: The Big bad boss of this uber is slow in movement speed and its melee attack alone is rather weak.Her Curse is her main strength and will almost always have you end up dead in battle.Abolish Triune Curse:Reduces targets overall speed by 90% and reduces HP to 1.Getting any kind of damage while cursed will be fatal.Deadly Spirits:Greatly increases overall speed and disables use any skill other than melee for nearby hostile members.

Name: Cow Honcho
Info: These are the crowd control cows and act as buff for the other cows.Zen Bolt:A single magic bolt that deals magic damage.Chronofield:Reduces overall speed of enemy.Pounce:Teleport to target and strike nearby enemies

Name: Cow Ninja
Skills: Hides and Moooves Silently, lvl 6 Vanquish
Info: Invisible cows strikes when you least expect it. Vanquish: Briefly grants a major boost to all damage

Name: Cow Soldier
Info: They die easily but their curse effect have a very long duration. Other Banish: Modified version of Banish spell. Effect: Reduced life of the cursed by a percentage

Name: Cow Shaman
Skills: Texas Giant Special, lvl 24 Thunder Slam
Info: Big cows dies easily but casts Thunder Slam on melee hits. Thunder Slam: Melee attack that unleashes a stunning shockwave.

Name: Cow Summoner
Skills: Summons More Cowbell, lvl 8 Mini Missiles, lvl 1 Spawn Cow
Info: It summons more cows to fight you and attacks from range by casting mini missiles. Mini Missiles: A single Bolt of Magic Missile dealing magic damage. Spawn Cow: Summon Cow Soldiers to fight for him.

Name: Bull Prince Rodeo-Uber Boss
Skills: lvl 40 Chicken Lickin, lvl 40 Hoof Stomp, lvl 1 Blink, lvl 40 Cow Rush
Info: He is the Uber boss of Cow lvl uber area and can be killed to obtain Fool's Gold charm. He is easy to kill if you have a bit of practice and know the correct method. Chicken Lickin-Casts 8 homing chickens who run at you and does heavy damage. Hoof Stomp-Casts a screen-wide nova that stuns and knockback. Blink-Teleports on top of you and stuns. Cow Rush-Casts a horde of running cows that deal high magic damage and usually kills in 1 hit.

Name: Arcane Toad
Location: Lost City, Claw Viper Temple Level 1-2
Skills: Stun Attack, Arcane Fury!, lvl 1 Magic Missiles
Info: It dies easily but be careful with his attack. Magic Missiles-Cast multiple homing magical bolts.

Name: Asatruar
Info: Just avoid punishers and youll be fine. Punisher-Slow moving spike ball dealing very high poison damage.

Name: Blood Stinger
Location: Rocky Waste, Dry Hills, Far Oasis, Palace Cellar Level 1-3
Skills: Stamina Drain, Open Wounds, lvl 2 Poison Flash
Info: Careful with its poison but otherwise it is easy to kill.

Name: Blur
Info: Weak monster as you can see from how it looks.

Name: Bone Archer
Location: Harem Level 1-2, Palace Cellar Level 1-3, Arcane Sanctuary

Name: Centaur
Location: Harem Level 1-2, Palace Cellar Level 1-3, Tal Rasha's Tomb
Skills: Speeds Up when Chilled, lvl 20 Bear Claw, Celerity
Info: No problem whatsoever in killing them. Bear Claw-Throw an axe that stuns and pierces through enemies. Celerity-Temporarily increases run speed and grants freeze immunity.

Name: Condemned
Info: Its Fire dmg is decent and can harm you if you are low on fire resistance. Apocalypse-Causes nearby enemies to burst into hellfire. Pyroblast-Fireball that sets flame to the area around impact.

Name: Cursed Soul
Info: They just shoot stuff and are weak but low resists can doom you.

Name: Desert Cat
Info: Attacks in melee but is very weak.

Name: Desert Priestess
Skills: Aura Enchanted, Mark of the Wild
Info: He is the leader of Desert Cats and his aura provides damage boost to all nearby allies. Mark of the Wild-Raises all damages.Bonus: He makes up as a decent reanimate on charms.

Name: Dreadwing
Location: Lost City, Canyon of the Magi
Info: Very weak and is never able to stay alive long enough to use his skill.

Name: Dungeon Troll
Skills: Casts Trollphase, lvl 5 Even More Amazing Grace, lvl 1 Engage Frenzy Mode
Info: Youll get bitchslapped, be careful with this one.In Frenzy Mode. he will be very fact and can lock you in Hit Recovery. Even More Amazing Grace-Grants 100% for 5 seconds. Engage Frenzy Mode-When low on HP, Frenzy Mode provides with a boost of damage and speed.

Name: Fallen Warrior
Location: Tal Rasha's Tomb, Spider Forest, Great Marsh
Skills: Aura Enchanted, lvl 1 Charge, Concentration Aura
Info: He only charges forward and do slow melee attacks. Concentration-The Concentration foot aura increases physical damage.

Name: Fata Morgana
Location: Lost City, Claw Viper Temple Level 1-2, Arcane Sanctuary
Info: Hes invisible, you can still see his shadow and dead body.

Name: Fire Tower
Info: Weak fire tower, just ignore him.

Name: Gargoyle
Location: Lost City, Canyon of the Magi, Harem Level 1-2, Palace Cellar Level 1-3
Skills: Lightning Hit, lvl 1 Shower of Rocks
Info: If you want to take a shower, stay close to these guys.  Shower of Rocks-Melee attack that pounds the target with boulders.

Name: Genie
Info: Spawned by Mummy Sarcophagus, is very weak.

Name: Ghost Flame
Info: Weakling. You can see its shadow. Lightning Bolt-Throws a lightning attack at you.

Name: Gloom
Location: Sewers Level 1-3, Halls of the Dead
Info: Weak bats that charges at you and does lightning type damage in melee hits.

Name: Landshark
Info: Very weak and throws low damage balls at you.

Name: Lightning Spire
Info: Weak lol.  Glacial Nova-Nova of ice that freezes all enemies. Supernova-Gigantic nova that does more damage at close range.

Name: Magma Demon
Info: Hit does strong fire damage, be careful. Multi Rock-Casts rapid fireballs dealing damage to multiple enemies.

Name: Marauder
Info: He can make you teleport on hit. Is very weak.

Name: Moon Panther
Info: Throws attack at you but are weak.

Name: Mummy Sarcophagus
Info: Summons Genie every few seconds and does nothing else.

Name: Oasis Guard
Location: Canyon of the Magi, Arcane Sanctuary
Info: Weak birds that die easily but they cast Bloodlust on death.giving good boost of damage to all nearby allies.

Name: Pest
Info: You better have fire immunity before you stand on top of its landminesas it casts a lot of them around its corpse on death.

Name: Pit Knight
Location: Rocky Waste, Dry Hills, Far Oasis
Skills: Fire Hit, lvl 2 Pounce, lvl 5 Dark Power
Info: They will jump on top of you, careful. Pounce-Teleport to target and strike nearby enemies Dark Power-Grants damage and crushing blow to the party

Name: Prowler
Location: Dry Hills, Lost City, Sewers Level 1-3, Halls of the Dead
Info: Not a threat. Mark of the Wild-Raises all damages.

Name: Prowler Priestess
Location: Rocky Waste, Dry Hills, Lost City, Harem lvl 1-2, Halls of the Dead
Info: Leader of Prowlers, provides nearby allies with damage boost aura, but is weak.

Name: Raider
Info: They have good damage and slow, be careful.

Name: Sand Devil
Location: Lost City, Halls of the Dead, Claw Viper Temple Level 2

Name: Sand Raider
Info: They have low HP but there hits can badly hurt you.

Name: Sewer Troll
Skills: Casts Trollphase, lvl 5 Even More Amazing Grace, lvl 1 Mon Engage Frenzy Mode
Info: Youll get bitchslapped, be careful with this one.In Frenzy Mode. he will be very fact and can lock you in Hit Recovery. Even More Amazing Grace-Grants 100% for 5 seconds. Engage Frenzy Mode-When low on HP, Frenzy Mode provides with a boost of damage and speed.

Name: Thunder Beetle
Location: Rocky Waste, Halls of the Dead
Skills: Lightning Hit, lvl 1 Merc Claw Tornado
Info: Can be dangerous if you engage for long in melee. Merc Claw Tornado-Melee attack that sends out spinning whirlwinds.

Name: Tomb Guardian
Skills: Lightning Hit, lvl 1 Merc Claw Tornado
Info: Have decent HP and does good damage in melee hits. Merc Claw Tornado-Melee attack that sends out spinning whirlwinds.

Name: Tomb Snake
Info: They Knockback and stun you with their charge attack, beware.

Name: Undead Vulture
Info: They are weak but gives Bloodlust bonus to nearby allies on death. Bloodlust-Increases damage and elemental damage of the party

Name: Unholy Scarab
Info: Have decent HP and does good damage in melee hits. Merc Claw Tornado-Melee attack that sends out spinning whirlwinds.

Name: Alpha Centaur
Location: Sewers Level 1-3, Worldstone Keep Level 1-2, Antechamber, Throne of Destruction
Info: They have strong attacks and can kill you if you underestimate them. Colosseum-Crash into target and raise an arena of fire that weakens enemies. Idol2Scosglen-Turn into stone, then break out of the stone, stunning enemies.

Name: Black Cat
Location: (H) Palace Cellar Level 1, Harem Level 1-2, Arcane Sanctuary
Info: Not very strong, easy to kill.

Name: Brood Swarm
Location: Rocky Waste, Dry Hills, Sewers Level 1-3, Halls of the Dead
Info: Summoned by Hivehosts, they move slowly and a hoard of them can hurt you bad.

Name: Corruptor Warlock
Location: Outer Steppes, City of the Damned , Palace Cellar lvl 3(in act2)
Info: It throws a strong poison attack,beware

Name: Daystar
Location: Far Oasis, Lost City, Claw Viper Temple Level 1-2
Info: Beware the Holy Trap, they stack and can kill you extremly fast if you are low on fire resist. Holy Trap-Places a landmine that explodes with holy fire.

Name: Grubber
Info: These are walking money bags that drop a lot of gold, but they also have good HP and life regeneration.Be careful with its poison tho.

Name: Hivehost
Location: Rocky Waste, Dry Hills, Sewers Level 1-3, Halls of the Dead
Info: They have decent poison damage and summons Brood Swarm to assist them in fight

Name: Ice Clan
Location: Canyon of the Magi, Palace Cellar Level 1-3, Claw Viper Temple Level 1-2, Tal Rasha's Tomb
Info: Just weaklings, but go for the caster first. BloodLordFrenzy-Increases attack speed with every attack.

Name: Ice Clan-caster version
Location: Canyon of the Magi, Palace Cellar Level 1-3, Claw Viper Temple Level 1-2, Tal Rasha's Tomb
Skills: lvl 16 Cold Blood, lvl 14 Mon Pain Spirit
Info: He is weak but his Cold Blood skill can hurt you. Cold Blood-Explodes a corpse to do damage in an area Mon Pain Spirit-Spirit tracks random enemy and deals magic damage

Name: Phantasm
Location: Halls of Anguish, Halls of Pain

Name: Shredder
Location: Canyon of the Magi, Harem Level 1-2, Palace Cellar Level1-3, Tal Rasha's Tomb, Arcane Sanctuary
Info: Not very strong but can give trouble with low cold immunity in destruction. Frozen Orb Nova-Casts cold damage dealing frozen orb that do damage in an area.

Name: Silverbolt
Info: Not very strong enemy but a group of them can give troule with low Lightning resistance. Couatl Lightning-Casts a ball of lightning that casts lightning as it moves.

Name: The Pack
Info: Be careful when in big groups.

Name: Tomb Curse
Info: Easy kills, no worries. Merc Claw Tornado-Melee attack that sends out spinning whirlwinds.

Name: Radament
Info: Careful with the thunderstone. Thunderstone-throw a rock that explodes into charged bolts on the ground Lightning Wall-wall of lightning that disintegrates when touched.

Name: Plaguewrath
Skills: Extra Fast, Multiple Shots, Spits poison

Name: Stormbane
Skills: Extra Fast, Magic Resist, lvl 3 Flash
Info: He and his minion will ambush you a soon as u enter this place but wont be much trouble. Flash-Short ranged electrical radius blast.

Name: Deadeye
Info: Throws a poison ball at you that spreads along its path.Casts Glacial Nova on death.

Name: The Summoner
Skills: lvl 1 Mon Respawner Target, lvl 10 Ring of Fire, lvl 12 Starfire, lvl 4 Other Banish
Info: Careful with his elemental dmg. Wealking. Starfire-Reduces all resistances of enemies nearby. Banish-reduced life of the cursed by a percentage. Respawner Target-Summons random monster from area to fight as ally. Ring of Fire-Casts a ring of fire which damage anyone who comes close.

Name: Flower Prowler
Info: Just ignore them, no reason to kill them. His minions heal him whenever you kill one of them.

Name: Duriel
Skills: lvl 5 Charge, lvl 17 Shower of Rocks, lvl 1 Idol2Scosglen, lvl 1 Void Archon Amp Aura
Info: Careful with shower of rocks and its fortress.Killing him the first time will unlock next act for you. Charge-Launches self at you at high speed. Shower of Rocks-melee attack that pounds the target with boulders. Idol2Scosglen-turn into stone, then break out of the stone, stunning enemies. Void Archon Amp Aura-Slows and weakens enemy by reducing their damage and def.

Name: Quov Tsin-Uber Boss
Skills: lvl 1 Omglazor, lvl 40 Elemental Rain, lvl 60 Swarm, Teleport when takes damage
Info: All his attacks are elemental so you can stack up 450% all resist and survive him. Omglazor-A concentrated beam of tri-elemental damage. Elemental Rain-A tri-elemental nova attack. Swarm-periodically creates poisonous clouds when approached.

Name: Necrobot
Info: Just be careful with big packs, they are immune to physical and they have high dmg.

Name: Hardliner
Info: Not much of a threat alone. Barrier Strike-Casts an arena of spike barriers around target.

Name: Neon Fiend
Info: Attacks in melee and slows you.

Name: Harpylisk
Info: Throws a ricocheting blade at you which deals high damage.

Name: Alpha
Info: Kill him on Terror difficulty to get Alpha Brain for Black Road Challenge.

Name: Beta
Info: Kill him on Terror difficulty to get Beta Brain for Black Road Challenge.

Name: Gamma
Info: Kill him on Terror difficulty to get Gamma Brain for Black Road Challenge.

Name: Delta
Info: Kill him on Terror difficulty to get Delta Brain for Black Road Challenge.

Name: Epsilon
Info: Kill him on Terror difficulty to get Epsilon Brain for Black Road Challenge.

Name: Pirate of The Twin Seas
Info: Attacks in melee, heals themselves. Hyena Strike-attack that poisons the target and spawns a health orb. Pestilence-summon a vile storm of toxic wrath.

Name: Athulua, The Amazonian Goddess-Uber Boss
Skills: lvl 40 Athulua Bow, lvl 50 Mickey Mouse, lvl 50 Eureka, lvl 10 Athulua Punisher
Info: Goddess <3  Athulua Bow-shoots shrapnel and time strike from bow in all directions. Mickey Mouse-summon Kethryes' Vermin rats. Eureka-Shoots a white bow attack. Athulua Punisher-Shoots multiple homing black stars.

Name: Pirate of The Twin Seas
Skills: lvl 6 ImpBolt, lvl 1 Ring of Light
Info: Not much of a threat. Impbolt-Throws some lightning bolt at you.

Name: Amazon Warrior
Skills: lvl 5 Guided Chain, (D) Arrowside on death
Info: Careful with big packs and guided chains. Guided Chain-An arrow that bounces between diferent tagets. Arrowside-devastating arrow storm around caster.

Name: Jungle Snake
Info: Does poison attack but is weak. Easy. Snake Poison-Long lasting poison attack.

Name: Volcanic Shrine
Info: Weak totem. Pyroclastic Flow-massive rolling wave from a distant volcanic eruption.

Name: Skovos, Priestess of Karcheus-Uber Boss
Skills: lvl 8 Phalanx New, lvl 1 Mon Tremor
Info: Careful with phalanx. Phalanx New-summons a line of spirit archers. Tremor-earthquake damages enemies by a percentage.

Name: Philios, Priestess of Hefaetrus-Uber Boss
Skills: lvl 8 Phalanx New, lvl 1 Mon Tremor
Info: Careful with phalanx. Phalanx New-summons a line of spirit archers. Tremor-earthquake damages enemies by a percentage.

Name: Lycander, Priestess of Zerae-Uber Boss
Skills: lvl 8 Phalanx New, lvl 1 Mon Tremor
Info: Careful with phalanx. Phalanx New-summons a line of spirit archers. Tremor-earthquake damages enemies by a percentage.

Name: Sand Maggot Egg
Info: They  give birth to Sand Maggot Ghosts.

Name: Sand Maggot Ghost
Skills: i will prevent your heal!, Immortal
Info: Care with poison and physical dmg. They cant be killed, just run away.

Name: Sand Maggot
Skills: Lays Egg, lvl 1 MagottUp, lvl 1 MagottDown, lvl 1 MagottLay
Info: High Poison damage. Kill them fast if u can. Lays Egg-Spawns Sand Maggot Young after hatching. MagottUp-Dives out of ground and attack. MagottDown-Dives into ground and hides. MagottLay-Spawn Sand Maggot Young.

Name: Sand Maggot Young
Skills: lvl 1 & 2 Punisher Green, lvl 5 & 63 Spit in yo' face
Info: High Poison damage. Punisher Green-Slow moving green punisher dealing high poison damage. Spit in yo' face-Throws very strong poison attack at you.

Name: Sand Snake
Info: Does high poison damage, dies easy.

Name: Brachyceran-Uber Boss
Skills: lvl 90 Barrel Rape, lvl 90 Punisher Orb, lvl 40 Mon Super DC, lvl 50 Egg Curse, lvl 90 Lorenado
Info: Get very high Poison Resist, be careful from its fire attacks and have high def for the maggots. Barrel Rape-Throws nova of barrels. Punisher Orb-Casts a screen full of punishers. Super DC-Throws multiple poison bomb. Egg Curse-Disable all enemy attacks. Lorenado-Advancing whirlwind of deadly books.

Name: Astral Guardian
Info: Grants you a shield to protect you against Creature of Flame's attack temporarily.

Name: Horazon Familiar-Mini Boss
Info: Just use the technique of kiting (hit and run). Serpent Charge-Charges at you with Knockback and stun attack.

Name: Creature of Flame-Uber Boss
Info: Its attacks will 1Shot you, dodge it. If you are melee you can get hit by the Astral Guardians to get a temporary shield.

Name: Horadric Mage
Skills: lvl 60 Mon Fire Bolt, lvl 30 Supernova, lvl 60 Mon Ele, lvl 60 Frozen Soul
Info: Kill all of them to remove immunity from Tal Rasha. Better lure them away 1 by 1. Fire Bolt-Throws a fast moving fire ball. Supernova-Gigantic nova that does more damage at close range. Ele-running fire spirits that explode on the target. Frozen Soul-cast a freezing orb at a random nearby enemy.

Name: Tal Rasha
Skills: lvl 60 Mon Fire Bolt, lvl 30 Supernova, lvl 60 Mon Ele, lvl 60 Frozen Soul
Info: Lure him away from the pack and just dodge attacks. Hes immune around Horadric Mages. Fire Bolt-Throws a fast moving fire ball. Supernova-Gigantic nova that does more damage at close range. Ele-running fire spirits that explode on the target. Frozen Soul-cast a freezing orb at a random nearby enemy.

Name: Disguised Edyrems-Stage 1
Info: Just a ghost of real Uldy, does only melee attack. Easy.

Name: Disguised Edyrems-Stage 2
Info: Fast moving floating sword, easy kill. Bladestorm-melee attack that unleashes homing magical swords.

Name: Disguised Edyrems-Stage 3
Info: can be killed easily if you know where to stand to be out of his attack zone. Spike Ripple Nova-A nova of spikes that do knockback, stun and damage.

Name: Disguised Edyrems-Stage 4
Info: Easy kill if u have good poison resists, there r also ranfinks in that place so beware. Super DC-Throws a lot of high poison damage bombs.

Name: Disguised Edyrems-Stage 7
Immunity: Physical, Magic, Fire, Lightning, Cold, Poison
Skills: lvl 90 Searing Light, lvl 50 Tremor, lvl 60 & 90 Mon Shadowstorm
